string-array.item: A traditional Provençal fish stew with saffron broth, shellfish, and Mediterranean herbs.
A rich beef stew originating from the Burgundy Region, slow-cooked in red wine with pearl onions and lardons.
Chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms, bacon, and aromatic herbs.
A Provençal vegetable medley of eggplant, zucchini, peppers, and tomatoes, infused with olive oil and herbs.
A slow-cooked casserole of white beans, duck confit, and Toulouse sausage, finished with a golden crust.
Silky vanilla custard topped with a crisp caramelized sugar crust.
